threads.title: Sync VS Code Files
threads.excerpt:
# Sync VS Code Files

**Date:** 2025-09-29

---

**User:** Fred, how do I get things that have been created in VS Code to synchronize with my local drive, my file explorer?

**Assistant:** Hey Carla —
breakthrough_moments:
wav files at col C;

C: Interactive - where the instructions and content detail for creating Assessments and Role Play Scenarios will be stored



The purpose of this is to provide a new structure using a mix of n8n and Apps Script that allows the user more access to oversee the course creation and contribute / feed into the process with human intelligence that makes the outcome truly unique

At an organisational level, this will later need to include access to internal files to enrich the research foundation/course creation by allowing vertex ai to search the user's own Google Workspace files for relevant materials on the designated topic/Theme

I will need your help to make this work as intended!!

learnings.details:
Here's where I'm at with the Phoenix Generator healthcare course workflow:



**CURRENT STATUS: AUTONOMOUS UNICODE FIXING IN PROGRESS**



I've identified and am actively resolving the core issue that was preventing audio file generation. ) are generating content with Unicode emojis (like 🎯)

- When the workflow tries to print this content to the Windows console, it hits CP1252 encoding limitations

- This causes the entire course generation to fail with: 'charmap' codec can't encode character '\U0001f3af'



✅ **What I've Fixed So Far:**

1. **Gamma URL Generation**: Fixed the consulting presentation URL construction issue
